name: GL Bajaj - Institute of Technology & Management
description: GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management, established by the Rajeev Memorial Academic Welfare Society,is a prominent educational hub in the Greater Noida/Delhi-NCR region. Recognized by the AICTE and affiliated with Dr A.P.J.Abdul Kalam Technical University, the institute is renowned for its B-Tech, MBA and MCA programs With a focus onholistic development, GL Bajaj ensures students receive a robust foundation for success. As a self financed instituteunder the governance of the Rajeev Memorial Academic Welfare Society, GL Bajaj consistently ranks among the top engineeringand management colleges in AKTU university results. Holding the highest pass percentage in the Noida and Greater Noidaregion for eight consecutive years, it stands out as a premier institution Acknowledged by NIRF and receiving awards forexcellence GL Bajaj is a distinguished name in engineering and management education emphasizing both academic achievementand overall student growth........

faqs.title: Is GL Bajaj private or government??
faqs.details: GL Bajaj Noida is a private college and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of HRD & Govt. of India. The college is also accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). The institute is also affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University (Formerly UPTU Lucknow).

faqs.title: Which courses are offered at G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management??
faqs.details: G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management provides various undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The flagship course is BTech. The courses offered by the institute include BTech, MTech, BBA, MBA, BCA, and MCA. The duration of the course is between two to four years. The admissions to these courses are merit and entrance-based. Interested candidates can apply online by visiting the official website. The entrance exams accepted include JEE Main, UPCET, MAT, CAT, etc.

faqs.title: How many departments does G L Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management have?
faqs.details: G L Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management has a total of 9 departments which include Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Information & Technology, etc.

faqs.title: Is GL Bajaj Noida a good college for BTech?
faqs.details: During GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management placements 2023, more than 300 companies visited the campus. The top recruiters who visited the campus include Paloalto, Amazon and Intuit. Moreover, according to data gathered from multiple online sources, the Engineering sector has placed the most no. of GL Bajaj Noida students.

faqs.title: Do G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management offers regular courses?
faqs.details: Yes, all the courses offered at the G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management are regular courses. The College offers courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and PhD levels across disciplines like engineering and management.

faqs.title: Is G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management good for placements?
faqs.details: The highest package and average package offered during GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management placements 2023 stood at INR 58 LPA and INR 7.12 LPA, respectively. Further, more than 300 companies visited the campus during GL Bajaj Noida placements 2023. The Average Package offered is INR 7.12 LPA

faqs.title: Can I take direct admission in GL Bajaj?
faqs.details: Yes, GL Bajaj offers direct admission through UPCET.

faqs.title: Is GL Bajaj Noida a good college for BTech?
faqs.details: During GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management placements 2023, more than 300 companies visited the campus. The top recruiters who visited the campus include Paloalto, Amazon and Intuit. Moreover, according to data gathered from multiple online sources, the Engineering sector has placed the most no. of GL Bajaj Noida students.

faqs.title: Is a student with an aggregate of 45 per cent in Class 12 eligible to apply for admission to GL Bajaj Institute of Management?
faqs.details: To be eligible to apply, candidates must have passed Class 12 with a minimum aggregate of 50% (General/ OBC category). For candidates from SC and ST, the minimum aggregate required is 40 per cent.

faqs.title: What is the admission process at GL Bajaj Institute of Management Greater Noida?
faqs.details: For admission to the institute, candidates need to register and apply online and meet the Admission Counsellor at GLBIM Greater Noida campus. Final selection is based on merit and performance in the PI round conducted by the institute.

faqs.title: Do G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management offers regular courses?
faqs.details: Yes, all the courses offered at the G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management are regular courses. The College offers courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and PhD levels across disciplines like engineering and management.

faqs.title: How is G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management campus?
faqs.details: The GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management boasts a vast 38-acre campus that offers contemporary amenities and cutting-edge infrastructure to its students. The campus is equipped with a range of facilities, including state-of-the-art laboratories, a spacious auditorium, conference rooms, a modern computer centre, excellence centres, a dedicated centre for innovation in learning and development, a well-stocked library, an NPTEL local chapter, a gymnasium and sports facilities, comfortable hostel accommodations, fully equipped classrooms, a mess and cafeteria, convenient transport facilities, a language and communication lab, a workshop, and comprehensive medical services, among others.

reviews.name: Prashant Shekhar
reviews.desc: Almost 85 to 95% of students are placed at the end of their course. The highest package in 2024 is 58 lakhs per annum by Palo Alto and Scaler360. The lowest or average package is about 6 to 7 LPA per student, according to their branches. Companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Walmart, and Accenture recruit from here. There are also several canteens with specialized themes like food, sports, etc. There is also a gaming area where you can play and watch games. There is also a tea spot where many students come in the evening to drink tea with friends and talk about their classes. The faculty is great and helps students as soon as possible. They teach great things about theoretical and practical knowledge. The curriculum here is provided by AKTU University. Semester exams are pretty average, so even if you are not so good at studies, you just need to practice questions. Overall, college life is very good; you won't regret your time at this college. There are many clubs and groups to join and participate in many fests, so GL Bajaj is good for your future, trust me.

reviews.name: Ayush Tripathi
reviews.desc: Above 90% of students in B.Tech CSE are placed. The highest package is about 39 LPA for the B.Tech CSE 2024 batch. The average package is about 7 to 8 LPA and for other branches, it is about 5 to 6 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. About 30 to 40% of students got internships. The college has a canteen, a fully AC library, and all the other sports grounds and courts are also there. The college has a workshop lab, graphic lab and computer labs. All classes are good but there is one problem the B.Tech classrooms are non-AC. This creates problems in studies in summer especially in May and June. So, I have one recommendation for the college to install AC in the classroom. All the teachers are well qualified and their teaching style is also better. All the teachers are very supportive they also support in tackling real-life problems. Overall, the teaching quality is the best. The semester exams are difficult to moderate level. The best thing about the course is that it has better placement than other courses. The college hosts only one main event annually. The campus size is not much bigger but is sufficient enough. Scholarships are provided by the UP government for financially weak students.

reviews.name: Sakshi Rai
reviews.desc: 90% of students were placed in my course ECE last year. 18 LPA is the highest package, 4 LPA is the lowest, and 7 LPA is the average package in my course. Infosys and Bosch are the top recruiting companies for our course. As I am in my 2nd year, there is no internship provided for us, but as the seniors talked, they said that in my 3rd year. Internships should be compulsory for all. Jio Wi-Fi is available for all students but only 1 GB per day. There are two libraries on the college campus for B.Tech. students. Classrooms are well organized, but there is no AC in classes, which is very bad in the summer. Teachers were very helpful, always ready to help the students. All faculty members are qualified and supportive. The Aktu syllabus is followed in the college. No, semester exams are not very difficult for us because college can prepare us very strictly for semester exams by the sessional exams 1, 2, and pre-test. In today's era, the electronics branch is too popular and there is scope in this branch. So take electronics and communication engineering. They should improve the lab systems. I am dissatisfied with the events at the college. Only freshers are held in terms of events.

name: Galgotias University
description: Galgotias University is a private university that was established in 2011. Galgotias University is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh and is recognised by the UGC. Galgotias University Noida is approved by the PCI, BCI, INC, COA, NCTE, and NCHM. Galgotias University has been ranked 91 in Management and 52 in Pharmacy by NIRF 2023. Galgotias University ranking showed an increasing trend when compared with the previous year. Galgotias University Uttar Pradesh offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, Integrated, and Doctoral programmes. The flagship courses offered at Galgotia University are BTech, BBA, BSc, BCA, and MBA. Galgotias University fees range from INR 5,000 to INR 6 lakh.

faqs.title: What is the fee structure of BBA at Galgotias University?
faqs.details:
Galgotias University's fee structure for a BBA course is inclusive of various components. As per the official website, Galgotias University BBA fees for a three-year course is INR 2.85 lakh. Whereas the tuition fee for a four-year BBA course ranges between INR 3.8 Lacs to INR 4.2 lakh.
 Apart from the Tuition Fees, candidates also have to pay for the Security Deposit (Refundable) and Application Fees. Students who apply for accommodation have to pay separate charges.
 For a detailed Galgotias University MBA fee structure, candidates are advised to visit the official website.

faqs.title: Is Galgotias University as good as Galgotias Educational Institutions (GEI)?
faqs.details:
Galgotias University is a good college, and its placements are good; it depends on your preparation for the job. Due to the higher intake at Galgotias, the average package is around 3-4 LPA.
 Admission to Galgotias can be obtained through two methods: first through AKTU counselling (based on JEE percentile), and second through direct admission.
 Overall, Galgotias is considered better than other private universities.

faqs.title: Is Galgotias University a good option for BBA?
faqs.details:
Galgotias University offers BBA courses in top specializations of the field, which include Aviation Management, Business Analytics, Tourism & Travel Management, etc.
 Moreover, students can also pursue four-year courses in BBA (Hons in Research) programs.
 The university offers impressive scholarships to meritorious students, and 100% tuition fee waivers are offered to the toppers of all the Board/University.
 Recently, Galgotias University has been ranked 12th by TIMES for its BBA course.
 As per the recent placement records, the average package was recorded at 5.4 LPA.

faqs.title: Which college is better for B.Tech (CS) in terms of placement: Sharda, LPU or Galgotias University?
faqs.details:
The B.Tech CSE program at LPU is unique, providing graduates with a competitive edge through a comprehensive education and practical experience with state-of-the-art technology.
 The curriculum is carefully crafted to meet industry standards, focusing on process design and development for both software and hardware.
 Eligibility requires a minimum aggregate of 60% in the Physics, Math, and English 10+2 examinations, or an equivalent qualification, subject to completing the LPUNEST.
 LPU's Computer Science and Engineering Department is one of Punjab, India's best institutions for computer science, placing a strong emphasis on overall growth with a curriculum designed to meet industry needs, strengthening students' soft and hard abilities.
 Graduating students routinely obtain jobs at major global corporations, including Apple, Google, and Microsoft.

faqs.title: Is MBA at Dr BR Ambedkar University Delhi better than Galgotias University?
faqs.details:
A comparison of the MBA programs offered by Galgotias University and Dr. B.R. Ambedkar University Delhi (AUD) depends on various variables, including industry contacts, facilities, faculty expertise, curriculum, and placement prospects.
 Dr. B.R. Ambedkar University, a well-known public institution in Delhi, is noted for its varied student body, emphasis on research, and interdisciplinary approach to teaching.
 The MBA program at the institution might provide access to a wealth of opportunities and resources, as well as a strong academic environment and knowledgeable instructors.
 Galgotias University, on the other hand, is a private university renowned for its emphasis on industry-focused education, state-of-the-art facilities, and strong placement support.
 In the end, opinions about which MBA program is 'better' differ according to personal tastes, professional objectives, and the unique features and benefits of each university.

faqs.title: Which one is better for B.Tech, Sharda School of Engineering and Technology or Galgotias University
faqs.details:
I was a student of Galgotias University, and my cousin attended Sharda University. We both shared the same room, so I'll compare both universities based on my experience.
1. *Admission Criteria:*
   - Galgotias University: Minimum 70%, tough without it. Management quota available with higher fees.
   - Sharda University: Admission with 60%, no extra charges.
2. *Fees:*
   - Galgotias University: INR 180k per annum.
   - Sharda University: INR 164k per annum (with concessions and gadgets).
3. *Backlog Fees:*
   - Galgotias University: INR 2500 to 3000 per subject.
   - Sharda University: INR 500 to 1000 per subject.
4. *Location:*
   - Galgotias University: Near village Dankaur.
   - Sharda University: Near Jagat Farm and Pari Chowk.
5. *Faculty:* Almost the same faculty in both universities.
6. *Placement:* Galgotias University is considered better with companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, IBM, Cognizant visiting annually.
7. *Infrastructure:* Sharda University has excellent infrastructure, but some parts are occupied by hospitals.
   
*Conclusion:* If you're opting for engineering, Galgotias University is recommended. For medical courses, Sharda University is a good choice. Best of luck!

faqs.title: Does Sharda School of Engineering and Technology offer better placements than Galgotias University?.
faqs.details:
Everyone considers campus placement records a crucial factor in selecting a college. In this context, Galgotia has a slight advantage over Sharda. However, when it comes to the highest package offered, Sharda takes the lead. Galgotia University boasts a better overall placement percentage compared to Sharda.

While both Galgotias University and Sharda University are reputable institutions for a B.Tech in CSE, based on student reviews and academic performance, Galgotias University is considered the better option. Galgotias University features a highly qualified and supportive faculty.

faqs.title: Is GNIOT as good as Galgotias University?
faqs.details:
GNIOT and Galgotias University are both well-known institutions, but they have some differences in placements and other factors. Here is a comparison of the two facilities:
1. *Ranking:* Galgotias University is ranked 31/246 in India Today Engineering, while GNIOT is ranked 93/160 in Outlook Engineering.
2. *Placements:*

faqs.title: Does Galgotias University offer better placements than Ishan Institute of Management and Technology?
faqs.details: Ishan Institute of Management and Technology is among the top 5 institutions in Delhi NCR. The college located in Greater Noida. The Ishan institute of Management and Technology offers placement to the maximum possible students of the batch. The highest package for the B.Com was 8 LPA.

faqs.title: How are placements for Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT) at Galgotias University college?
faqs.details: Source: B.P.Th students & alumni} I'd be happy to help with that. Based on the information provided in the five reviews about the Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT) programme at Galgotias University, here is a list summarizing the placement details:1. Placements for BPT students at Galgotias University are generally high, with an average placement rate of around 70-80%.2. The highest salary package offered to BPT graduates is around 8 LPA, while the average salary package is around 3-5 LPA.

reviews.name: Arpit Shekhar
reviews.desc: I am a student of the BBA Course. The highest package is up to 8 Lacs, and the lowest is up to 3 to 4 Lacs. There are numerous top recruiters in the college who offer the best level of opportunities to the students. Roles offered to them include HR Manager and many more. There are different labs, many Wi-Fi routers, and different halls. The quality of food is good; it also provides sweets to eat. There are different types of sports like football, cricket, and many more. There is a canteen which provides all types of food and many more things. The teaching quality is nice; the teacher used to speak only in English.

reviews.name: Aryan Dube
reviews.desc: The placement of our college is really nice. The placement cell really helps students grab opportunities, including both jobs and internships. Our college also has the Apple iOS development center, which is the only development center in North India. The infrastructure of our college is really advanced. All the classes have AC and projectors along with charging ports for mobiles and laptops under every seat. The library is accessed by scanning the ID card. The labs are really nice. We have Mac labs also supported by Apple. The education system of our college is great. The faculty is really helpful and comprises great knowledge.

reviews.name: Shivansh Shukla
reviews.desc: Galgotia offers decent placements. A lot of companies come for on-campus recruitments, but your selection depends on your ability to convince the HR in the interview. The placement percentage is quite satisfying and a lot of students get placed every year depending on their skills in great companies like Amazon, TCS, and Wipro. It has pretty and spacious classrooms. They provide only a boys hostel so I have no review on that. The canteen also consists of multiple food stations where you can eat according to your preferences. The faculty is quite helpful and qualified, almost everyoneâ€™s holding a Ph.D. degree. Their teaching quality is quite good. The course curriculum is relevant and beneficial.

name: Amity university
description: Amity University has a total of nine universities spread across India, 14 overseas/international campuses, 13 B.Schools in India, and 26 pre-schools and schools. Amity University Noida is recognised by the UGC, AICTE, AIU, ACU, Ministry of HRD, DISR, Ministry of Sci...

faqs.title: Which university is better for MBA among Amity, CU and LPU?
faqs.details:
Dear prospective student,
Both institutions are commendable, and Lovely Professional University (LPU), established in 2005, stands as one of India's premier educational establishments. Recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC), LPU boasts over 20 schools offering diploma, undergraduate, post-graduate, and doctoral programs across 200+ disciplines, including engineering, management, pharmacy, social sciences, and hotel management, all within a comprehensive campus.
LPU distinguishes itself with a superior curriculum, state-of-the-art facilities, and a highly qualified faculty.
Encompassing a vast 900-acre campus, LPU is a diverse and inclusive institution, home to over 30,000 students, including individuals from various parts of India and more than 3,500 international students from 50+ countries. Noteworthy are the 47th National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) Rankings 2022, where LPU secured positions such as 12th in Architecture, 13th in Law, 19th in Pharmacy, 34th in Management, and 51st in Engineering among all government and private universities in India.
The LPU campus provides extensive sporting facilities, featuring grounds for cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, and badminton. The residential facilities are meticulously organized and maintained, offering a home-like, healthy stay.
LPU's collaboration with top companies ensures industry-oriented programs, and its alumni have made their mark in renowned global brands like Apple, Google, Yahoo, Microsoft, Bank of America, with attractive packages exceeding 1 Crore.
Without any hesitation, LPU is a compelling choice for your educational journey.
Best regards.

faqs.title: I know so little & have NO interest in Computer but I like the idea of bussiness & online stuff, Marketing then should I take BCA or BBA?
faqs.details:
Choosing a BBA would be my recommendation, offering the chance to specialize in marketing or digital marketing based on personal preference. This course presents a platform to:
- Unleash personal creativity.
- Propel oneself into a Digital Marketing career.
- Benefit from an advanced curriculum, tech-driven learning, and industry exposure.
- Gain a competitive edge for lucrative future jobs.
Throughout the course, opportunities arise to explore interests and secure internships. Even if uncertain about a specific path, niches like SEO expert, graphic designing, or social media marketing can be pursued. Admittance to the best university is vital for achieving these goals, and in Punjab, Chandigarh University stands out. It offers premier courses, comprehensive career counseling, and an impressive track record of internships and placements. With over 900 companies, including global giants like Google and Microsoft, participating in placements, the university provides unparalleled opportunities. For more details, reaching out to the regional office of Chandigarh University in your city is advisable.
